purpose: To simplify and automate the process of website creation using AI-driven design and code generation.
principle: Utilizes machine learning algorithms to analyze design patterns and generate corresponding HTML/CSS code.
reusability: Designed to be easily integrated into existing web development workflows, with API support for automation.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited design templates and customization options.
name: WebDesignAgent
highlight: Automates website creation by generating code and design elements using AI.
